External SyntheticBandit

Source: R/bandit_synthetic.R
SyntheticBandit.Rd

SyntheticBandit intro

Usage

b <- SyntheticBandit$new()
    b$reset()
    print(b)

Arguments

b

A SyntheticBandit object.

Details

$new() starts a new SyntheticBandit, it uses pipe. R does not wait for the process to finish, but returns immediately.

Examples

# NOT RUN {
# }
